author: watkins656
body:
# Documentation Issue

In the help for Set-ExecutionPolicy, the help is innacurate.  It appears that either there are no acceptable values for this parameter, or that the first acceptable value is Required? true.  Neither of which is correct.

The actual acceptable values should be listed here.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38428507/69755213-5b32c880-111d-11ea-87dd-f63113d04f51.png)

comments.author: vexx32
msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Documentation Issue
